channel.title: Cwars
channel.description: ok i got a problem this tutorial i folowed for 100% cwars for delta sources which i have http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=161950 which is that i did it was successfull but um when i go in it says game has started then kicks me out does anybody know how to fix this with that tutorial.

item.title: Cwars
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“ionforeva, post:19, topic:303446”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=399771.msg2965131#msg2965131 date=1253501769]

But he can get a better 1 with 100% cwars and more mini’s…

Point Fs… P:

You lazy dick. adding it yourself is better, because you learn
[/quote]

lmao its only a game what good does it do learning from it… why not take shortcuts… not likes its gona get you anywhere in life… and you fail[/quote]

Lazy Beaner. Learning helps you advance. So you wont have to use this section, because i know all you do is get a source and change the name, say it’s yours, and then find a new one thats better and keep repeating.

Read full topic

item.title: Cwars
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

ok i got this timer and another heres one thats in client.java
public int cwarsdeadtimer = -1;
public boolean hasFlag = false;
public boolean issara = false;
public boolean iszammy = false;
public static boolean gameStarted = true;
public static int saramember = 0;
public static int zammymember = 0;
public static int gameTimer = 1000;
these ones are from playerhandler.java
public static int pitsWaitTimer = 1000;
public static int pcWaitTimer = 1000;
public static int cwTimer = 1000;
if(client.gameTimer > 1000) {
client.gameTimer -= 1000;
}
if(pcWaitTimer > 0){
pcWaitTimer -= 10;
}
if(cwTimer > 0){
cwTimer -= 1000;
}
if(pitsWaitTimer > 0){
pitsWaitTimer -= 10;
}
if(pcWaitTimer == 0){
pcWaitTimer = 0;
}
if(cwTimer == 0){
cwTimer = 1000;
}
if(pitsWaitTimer == 0){
pitsWaitTimer = 10;
}
so which timer is off

Read full topic
